Name: Halloween Rhythm
About the game: This is a Chiptune Rhythm game for Halloween aficionados everywhere! Six spooky songs with two difficulty settings. The easy mode has you controlling a witch as she collects pumpkins to the beat. Hard mode will test your reflexes as you move the little witch's wand in rhythm. Saint-Saëns – Danse Macabre Paul Dukas - The Sorcerer's Apprentice Richard Wagner - Ride of the Valkyries Mussorgsky – Night on Bald Mountain Giuseppe Verdi - Dies Irae from his Requiem Chopin – “Funeral March” from his Piano Sonata No. 2 [How to Play] You must hit the notes at the right time [Main Menu] Left click....................................Choose a game [Normal Mode] Up/Down Arrow......................Move up or down Spacebar....................................Toggle Pause [Hard Mode] Left/Right Arrow...................Move left or right Spacebar..................................Toggle Pause [Pause Mode] Spacebar..................................Toggle Pause Left click..................................Choose to resume playing or go to Main Menu
